Uses of Class
FSA.Simulator

Packages that use Simulator
FMA Finite Memory Automata, extends the package FSA. 
FSA Finite State Automata, this is the basic package including all the class to extend. 
PFSA Pushdown Finite Scope Automata, extends the package FSA. 
 

Uses of Simulator in FMA
 

Subclasses of Simulator in FMA
 class FMASimulator
          Extends Simulator by adding the registers and change the condition of validity of transitions, and override various methods.
 

Methods in FMA that return Simulator
protected  Simulator FMA.createSim()
          Create an instance of the simulator for an FMA
 

Uses of Simulator in FSA
 

Methods in FSA that return Simulator
protected  Simulator FSA.createSim()
           
 

Uses of Simulator in PFSA
 

Subclasses of Simulator in PFSA
 class PFSASimulator
          Extends the Simulator by changing the notion of validity of a transition, also handling fresh names.
 

Methods in PFSA that return Simulator
protected  Simulator PFSA.createSim()
          Create an instance of the simulator for the PFSA
